pullRequest.title: Fixed usage of deprecated constructor for 'DateTimeType(Calendar)'
pullRequest.bodyText:
Fixed usage of deprecated constructor for DateTimeType(Calendar)

This is a very rough replacement by just converting Calendar into ZonedDateTime values. I am pretty sure in most cases the logic behind it can be improved even more by doing a deeper refactoring of the code / the origin of theses values.
But it would be nice to get support by the binding developers because it is too error-prone without deeper knowledge.
Related to openhab/openhab-core#1500
Signed-off-by: Christoph Weitkamp github@christophweitkamp.de

commit.message:
Removed deprecated constructors and methods

Signed-off-by: Christoph Weitkamp <github@christophweitkamp.de>
